Package com.neu.prattle.service

Interface UserServiceWithGroups

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceWithGroupsImpl
    public interface UserServiceWithGroups
    Handles CRUD DB operations for Group objects

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • findGroupByName

        java.util.Optional<BasicGroup> findGroupByName​(java.lang.String user,
                                               java.lang.String groupName)
        Returns a Group that a User is a member of
        Parameters:
        user - is the username of the User
        groupName - is the name of the Group
        Returns:
        a BasicGroup if one is found, else Optional.Empty()

      • addGroup

        void addGroup​(BasicGroup group)
        Creates a new persistent Basicgroup
        Parameters:
        group - is the BasicGroup

      • deleteGroup

        void deleteGroup​(User sender,
                 BasicGroup group)
        Deletes a group is the sender is a moderator of the Group
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User requesting to delete the Group
        group - is the Group to be deleted

      • extendUsers

        void extendUsers​(User sender,
                 User user,
                 BasicGroup group)
        Adds a User to a Group
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User adding a new member to the Group
        user - is the User to be added to the Group
        group - is the Group gaining a new member

      • extendModerators

        void extendModerators​(User sender,
                      User user,
                      BasicGroup group)
        Adds a moderator to a Group
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User adding a moderator to the group
        user - is the User being added as a moderator
        group - is the Group that is gaining a moderator

      • removeUser

        void removeUser​(User sender,
                User user,
                BasicGroup group)
        Removes a User from a Group
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User removing a member from the Group
        user - is the User to remove from the Group
        group - is the Group to remove the User from

      • removeModerator

        void removeModerator​(User sender,
                     User user,
                     BasicGroup group)
        Removes a moderator from a Group
        Parameters:
        sender - is the User removing a moderator
        user - is the moderator to remove
        group - is the Group to remove a moderator from

      • isTest

        boolean isTest()
        Returns value indicating whether UserService is configured for testing
        Returns:
        true if configured for testing else false
